title: Is Friday prayer obligatory? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: well Friday is very important it is obligatory mmm to every male and the ayat is crystal clear ayah nine in verse 62 you can check it out in your must must have and the prophet had said and mentioned that I saw some that attending Friday pray is an obligation to everyone who has attained puberty so this is a must it's not something that okay I'll do it one Friday and skip on Friday or yeah it is highly recommended it's a communal obligation no this is an individual obligation not a communal of education
